speaker.whotheyare: Dominic Price is a work futurist with the desire to make the world a better place.
speaker.whylisten:
As a work futurist Dominic Price roams between Australia, US, Europe and Asia seeks to build a happier, more effective, and more balanced future. He believes the future is human and in the business of finding ways to unleash our collective potential.
 
Currently, Price works at software giant Atlassian.
